name: PETRA (chicaflama)
description:
The story beginss with Petra, a young lady bewitched by an evil man who sent her to the future. Now she has to fight her way back to her world.

This is a project I've been working on for a school project. I really hope you enjoy it! :D Hopefully, I'll be releasinga final version in a not so distant future...
